final static String GREETING = "    Hi, I am Kyrene, your private reminder assistant.\n"
+ "    What can I do for you?\n";
final static String BYE = "    Bye! Wish to see you again soon!\n";
final static String ERROR_WRITE_TO_FILE_FAILED = "    Error! Write to file failed.\n";
final static String ERROR_FOLDER_CREATION_FAILED = "    Error! Folder creation failed.\n";
final static String ERROR_FILE_CREATION_FAILED = "    Error! File creation failed.\n";
final static String ERROR_FILE_CORRUPTED = "    Error! File loaded is corrupted.\n";
final static String ERROR_TASK_NOT_EXIST = "    Error! This task does not exist.\n";

final static String ERROR_MISSING_TASK = "    Error! Your task description is missing.
    For creating tasks, please type "[task type (todo/deadline/event)] [task description]"([] is to be omitted).
    For example:
        todo have a nice day
    or
        deadline get a cup of coffee /by 9am
    or
        event celebrate birthday /from 27th Oct 1700 /to 2359
";

final static String ERROR_MISSING_TIME = "    Error! Your deadline/event task created is incomplete in terms of time.
    For creating deadline task, please type "deadline [task description] /by [time]"([] is to be omitted).
    For example:
        deadline get a cup of coffee /by 9pm
    For creating event task, please type "event [task description] /from [starting time] /to [ending time]"([] is to be omitted).
    For example:
        event celebrate birthday /from 27th Oct 1700 /to 2359
";

final static String ERROR_INVALID_COMMAND = "    Error! This command is invalid. Some available commands are ([] is to be omitted):
        list
        mark [task index]
        unmark [task index]
        delete [task index]
        [task type (todo/deadline/event)] [task description]
        bye
";

public Deadline(String line, boolean isDone) throws KyreneMissingTimeException {
return String.format("[%s][%s] %s (by %s)", taskType, doneSymbol, taskName, deadline);
public String format() { return String.format("%b deadline %s /by %s\n", isDone, taskName, deadline);}
public Event(String line, boolean isDone) throws KyreneMissingTimeException {
return String.format("[%s][%s] %s (from: %s to: %s)", taskType, doneSymbol, taskName, startTime, endTime);
public String format() { return String.format("%b event %s /from %s /to %s\n", isDone, taskName, startTime, endTime);}
public String format() { return String.format("%b task %s\n", isDone, taskName);}
public String format() { return String.format("%b todo %s\n", isDone, taskName);}
